
```{r}
caption <- readtext(file = paste0(dir_out_figures, nickname, ".txt"))$text
path <- paste0(dir_out_figures, nickname, ".png")
img <- magick::image_read(path) # read the image using the magic library
img.asp <- image_info(img)$height / image_info(img)$width # calculate the figures aspect ratio
```

```{r, fig.cap = caption, fig.id = nickname, fig.asp = img.asp, fig.alt = caption, fig.width = 6.5}
knitr::include_graphics(path = path)
```
